Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2008 09:16PM jme wrote: That's so great that it was removed same day as biopsy!  I had a biopsy May 17th and won't have tumor removed until June 18th. Waiting is not fun and deciding on lumpectomy or mastectomy is not easy.   I will be praying for you and hope the best!
Posts.Title: Biopsy done yesterday sbd jme

Posts.Content: Jun 13, 2008 04:39AM jme wrote: Well here I am too, new, feeling anxious but ready to have my surgery, June 18th, lumpectomy and nodes removed.   I know I was nervous because I have low blood pressure and it was 154/71 at my pre'op appt. today, quite high for me.   I have invasive lobular cancer in rt. breast, won't know stage or if in nodes until after surgery.  It is quite overwhelming but I have had a peace  that only comes from knowing that I am not in charge but God is, and His grace is sufficient.  Thank Carolyn for your practical help as well as your heart.  Thank you for caring about us.
Posts.Title: Surgery in June? carollyn Kymberlyn
